page.title: 13Children's Games in Fife
page.content: In our schools there are many different games that we play.In winter the most popular games are sliding on the ice,sledging and having snowball fights.If the weather is really bad we stay indoors and play chess or draw.In summer one of the most popular of girl's games is skipping.Two people each take an end of a rope and turn it in a wide circle by swinging their arms.Somebody else stands in the middle and skips over the rope.If they trip up that means they are out.Other popular summer games are hide and seek and rounders.Most of us also have bicycles and we play on them almost all the year round.Another game which never seems to lose its popularity is marbles.In addition to these football is played all year round by most boys anywhere they can find to play it.
